parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To throw away from, throw overboard, cast aside. From apo and ballo; to throw off; figuratively, to lose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To leap into, rush into. From eis and pedao; to rush in.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
